cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.SI, cs.CL, cs.CY 

This paper is likely to belong to the Information Retrieval (cs.IR) sub-category as it deals with personalized recommendation systems. It also involves learning hidden fields vectors for each user, which is a common technique used in machine learning and falls under the Machine Learning (cs.LG) sub-category. The paper also mentions the use of graphical models, which is a common technique in Statistical Inference (cs.SI). Additionally, the paper discusses the use of existing infrastructure for content-based models, which falls under the Computational Linguistics (cs.CL) sub-category. Finally, the paper discusses the deployment of the system on LinkedIn, which involves issues related to Cybersecurity (cs.CY).
